alert.note: Alert for Greater Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 25 at 2:53PM AKDT until May 28 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR NORTHERN BRISTOL BAY INLAND AREAS... * Winds...Northwest 5 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * Timing...Friday morning through Saturday evening. * Relative Humidity...As low 15 to 25 percent. * Temperatures...Daytime highs in the low to mid 70s. * Location...Northern inland portions of Bristol Bay from King Salmon northward towards Iliamna and north of Dillingham including New Stuyahok and Koliganek. * Impacts...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
